title: john powell: The Pandemic is a Missed Opportunity to Address Racial Disparities
itunes:title: john powell: The Pandemic is a Missed Opportunity to Address Racial Disparities
description: INET board member and Othering & Belonging Institute Director john a. powell discusses the ways in which the pandemic intersects with racial inequality and how government policy could address both problems at the same time.
content:encoded: INET board member and Othering & Belonging Institute Director john a. powell discusses the ways in which the pandemic intersects with racial inequality and how government policy could address both problems at the same time.
